metadata.title: CVE-2021-23382 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The package postcss before 8.2.13 are vulnerable to Regular ExpressionDenial of Service (ReDoS) via getAnnotationURL() and loadAnnotation() inlib/previous-map.js. The vulnerable regexes are caused mainly by thesub-pattern \/\*\s* sourceMappingURL=(.*).

criterions.comment: node-postcss package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
